title: Inspired: How To Create Products Customers Love
description: This book by Marty Cagan is a definitive guide for product managers, designers, and entrepreneurs who want to build successful technology products. It covers the principles, team dynamics, and processes that distinguish the best product organizations. Through practical advice and real-world examples, Cagan emphasizes how to create products that solve real customer problems, deliver value, and drive business success. The book explores leadership, organization, discovery, and delivery methods within top-performing companies.

modules.title: Introduction to Product Management
modules.goal: Understand the foundational role of product management and its impact on product success.
key_points: Defines what product management is and why it matters.
Explains the difference between good and great product teams.
Highlights the key responsibilities of a product manager.

modules.title: Understanding Customers and Their Problems
modules.goal: Learn how to identify real customer needs and problems worth solving.
key_points: Emphasizes the importance of deeply understanding customers.
Describes methods for discovering customer problems.
Explains why solving valuable problems leads to successful products.

modules.title: Product Teams and Company Culture
modules.goal: Recognize the significance of empowered teams and the culture needed for innovation.
key_points: Discusses the composition of great product teams.
Outlines the characteristics of empowering product cultures.
Highlights leadership’s role in fostering innovation.

modules.title: The Product Discovery Process
modules.goal: Master techniques for validating ideas before building products.
key_points: Introduces product discovery as a method to reduce risk.

modules.title: Delivering and Scaling Products
modules.goal: Understand how to deliver, launch, and scale successful products.
key_points: Describes the transition from discovery to delivery.
Covers best practices for launching products.
Discusses metrics and learning from product launches.

modules.title: Leadership and Organizational Success
modules.goal: Explore how leadership shapes product outcomes and organizational effectiveness.
key_points: Highlights the impact of strong product leadership.
Explains how leaders set vision and strategy.
Covers the need for continuous learning and adaptation.
